! cue cmd baddisplay
! stdout .
cmp stderr cmd_baddisplay.out

-- cmd_baddisplay.out --
command.baddisplay.display: conflicting values 42 and string (mismatched types int and string)
-- task.cue --
package home
message: "Hello world!"

-- task_tool.cue --
package home

command: baddisplay: {
	display: {
		kind: "print"
		text: 42
	}
}
